<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List all workflow steps"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/workflows/steps"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Lists workflow steps (ticket statuses) available to the authenticated tenant with paging and filter support.

**Note**: This endpoint is part of API version 1.0 which is marked as deprecated.

**Default Paging**: Returns up to 100 records per page, sorted by `Name` ascending.

**Prerequisites**:
1. **Workflow context** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) to read `Item.WorkflowStep.WorkflowId`, or call workflow endpoints to determine the workflow.
2. **Filtering** - Prepare optional OData-style filters such as `$filter=WorkflowId eq {workflowId}` to narrow results.

**Workflow Example**:
1. Identify a ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with filters â†’ extract `Items[0].WorkflowStep.WorkflowId`.
2. Call [GET /api/v1.0/workflows/steps](/docs/api/workflows/get-workflow-steps) with `$filter=WorkflowId eq {workflowId}` to fetch valid transitions.
3. Use `Items[].WorkflowStepId` when updating tickets.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index to retrieve.","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"default":0},"example":0},{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of records per page.","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"default":100},"example":20},{"name":"$filter","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Filter expression applied to the result set (e.g., `(WorkflowId eq {workflowId})` or `(StepName contains 'Resolved')`).","schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"(WorkflowId eq 11111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555)"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

</RequestSchema>
